verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: saluted] [ARG1: the Black Knights] [ARGM-MNR: with the annual Commander - in - Chief ’s Trophy] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] , [ARGM-ADV: recounting their victory over Navy]
[ARG0: Trump] saluted the Black Knights with the annual Commander - in - Chief ’s Trophy on Tuesday , [V: recounting] [ARG1: their victory over Navy]
